# DHCP Option-82 Configuration at Aruba Controller

DHCP Option 82 is a relay agent information option. 

The controller can be configured to add Option 82 information to DHCP requests from clients before forwarding the requests to a DHCP server. 

* Required config: 

1- upload option-82 XML at the Aruba controller from CLI 

2- select it from UI 

3- enable opt82 on the VLAN.
